overview: During a scientific conference in Armenia, an international sabotage group led by a half-English half-Iranian woman, arrange for her to meet an Iranian scientist and his brother. She soon becomes attracted to the scientist and it leads her to be able to go to Iran and gain access to Iran's military facilities and spy on them. She is concerned with the information she is looking for and not at all aware that she is being closely watched herself.
title: Fox Hunting
